body.p: Farmer. Born in 1834. Married to Permelia Peyton. Children included Gellie A., Mollie, Sallie, Ella, and Valintine. Enlisted in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment on November 1, 1861. Promoted to 2nd Lieutenant on July 1, 1863; to 1st Lieutenant on April 10, 1864.
